The situation is not similar to Hunter B: s appointment to the board of a Ukrainian energy company, Burisma.
Paul Pelosi Jr: once served on the board of an American energy company, Viscoil. After he left the board, the company dissolved and re-formed in Singapore under a different name.
Pelosi Jr: had no part in the new entity, which is not based in Ukraine. It’s unclear to what extent the company has done any business in Ukraine.
There is no evidence that Pelosi Jr: served as an executive for a Ukraine-based gas company.
